abstract: Close to a decade ago the illustrator Matt Vescovo did some pretty hilarious animations in the style of public service announcements that appeared on MTV.
snippet: Close to a decade ago the illustrator Matt Vescovo did some pretty hilarious animations in the style of public service announcements that appeared on MTV.
lead_paragraph: Close to a decade ago the illustrator Matt Vescovo did some pretty hilarious animations in the style of public service announcements that appeared on MTV. I thought they were worth revisiting.
